meanings.definition: Persons of the same age or generation.
meanings.sent1: My coevals and I graduated together.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys spending time with her coevals from school.
meanings.sent3: The coevals at the party all shared similar interests.
meanings.sent4: In the classroom, the teacher grouped us with our coevals.
meanings.sent5: Growing up, my coevals were my closest friends.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The coevals events made for a busy weekend.
meanings.sent2: The two coevals projects were completed simultaneously.
meanings.sent3: It was a coevals occurrence that they both arrived late.
meanings.sent4: The coevals trends in fashion changed rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The coevals inventions revolutionized the industry.
